desc: Adaptive clothes for women with Alzheimer's and Dementia. Includes pants, trousers, skirts, dresses, nightgowns, capes, jackets, sweaters. Easy dressing created with Long term care nurse and care giver input. Free shipping on orders of $100. 100% money back satisfaction guarantee. Clothes for seniors in extended care.

layout.text: Adaptive fashions for dressing with style and comfort.
